title: Monts-Chalet
text:
Nestled at 1200 meters in the heart of the Alpes Vaudoises, Les Diablerets is an authentic mountain village located at the foot of an imposing mountain range and topped with a majestic glacier.
Consisting entirely of chalets, this charming village has managed to maintain its heritage while developing. During the winter and summer, the main road at the village is fully accessible to pedestrians, making it possible to enjoy this typical atmosphere in total peace. Walkers can enjoy exceptional moments strolling along the river.
The facilities offered by Les Diablerets are especially suited to conferences. A Conference Centre located in the middle of the village is ideal for hosting large events, such as an Alpine film festival (the FIFAD), and offers an ideal infrastructure for hosting groups and conferences.
For more informations about the activities in Les Diablerets, please visit Alpes Vaudoises > Les Diablerets

title: Monts-Chalet
text:
The Glacier
The proximity of the Diablerets Glacier (Glacier 3000) allows visitors to combine activities on the glacier with other activities offered in the resort, throughout the year. Skiing is guaranteed from November to May and thrill seekers will be delighted with the famous black run – the “Combe d’Audon” or the Snow Park.
During the summer season, the glacier offers the Alpine Coaster, one of the highest bob sled run on rails in Europe as well as other activities such as trips in the snow bus, excursions with dog sleds. You can also enjoy various routes of the Via Ferrata from the Pillon pass.
The glacier is home to the Peak Walk, the first high altitude bridge in the world linking two peaks. More than 100 metres span, and with stunning views of more than 24 summits that exceed 4000 metres, accessible to all glacier visitors all year round.
For more informations about the activities in Glacier 3000, please visit Glacier 3000 > EN

title: Monts-Chalet
text:
Located at the lower floor of the chalet, the apartment can accommodate up to 5 people. It is built as follows:

1 spacious living room with sitting area, dining area and fully equipped open kitchen
1 bedroom with a double bed
1 bedroom with bunk beds for 3 persons
1 bathroom with a bathtub and a double washbasin
1 separate toilet
1 laundry room with a washing machine and a dryer
1 large terrace
1 ski room with a boot dryer, sledges and snowshoes
1 indoor parking slot and outside parking spaces

title: Monts-Chalet
text:
Rental
The apartment is available to rent on a weekly basis from Saturday to Saturday for Christmas, New Year and during peak season, or for at least 3 nights during the mid-peak season and at least 2 days during the off-peak season. Feel free to contact us for any other specific request.
The rental rates are:

Christmas or New Year’s weeks: CHF 3200
Week during the peak season: CHF 2400
Week during the mid-peak season: CHF 2000
Week during the off-peak season: CHF 1600

Rates include all utilities, including linens, bed linens, and bath linens. End-of-stay cleaning is included, but we reserve the right for a surcharge in the event of excessive use.
Additional services can be provided upon request such as catering, laundry and daily cleaning, delivery of skis and passes to the chalet, daily newspapers, childcare.
Pets are not allowed.
A deposit of CHF 500 will be required.
You will find current availabilities in the following shared calendar

title: Monts-Chalet
text:
Located in the heart of the Alpes Vaudoises in the village of Les Diablerets, Monts-Chalet has a full of light panoramic view of the Diablerets glacier, the Meilleret ski sector and the famous Tour d’Aï and Tour de Mayen.
The chalet offers tranquility and comfort and is easy to access. It includes one indoor parking lot and outside parking spaces. It is close to the village, the slopes and the ski lifts. Local shops are within walking distance.

title: Monts-Chalet
text:
L’Appartement by Monts-Chalet
The apartment is located on the ground floor of Monts-Chalet and can accomodate up to 5 people. It offers a cozy living room organized in three zones: an modern and fully equipped open kitchen; a large dining table and a lounge area that comfortably accommodates all guests.
A ski storage room with a shoe dryer is at your disposal. Sledges, snowshoes and sticks are available for free during your stay. Sheets and household linen are provided.
